price: Dachii keessan irraa isin baasuu fedha; maal ajajjuree?" (jedheen).
arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُمۡۖ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yurīdu an yukh'rijakum min arḍikum famādhā tamurūna
